tasks.task_description: Create sandboxed code execution service with resource limits and timeouts
Add MicroVM/Firecracker integration for secure container isolation
Implement build cache proxy using existing nginx cache as foundation
Add cloud runner integration (Modal, serverless) for external execution
Create UI screenshot capture service for containerized apps
Add Kubernetes deployment manifests for scalable container orchestration
Implement telemetry and resource monitoring for containers

description: Enhance k0bra portfolio system with advanced containerization, cloud execution, and build caching capabilities
context: Created sandbox_executor.py with Docker-based code execution, resource limits (128MB RAM, 0.5 CPU), 30s timeout, and network isolation. Supports Python, Node.js, and Go with minimal Alpine images.

Created microvm_manager.py with Firecracker MicroVM integration for ultra-secure code execution. Features 128MB RAM limit, no network access, automatic cleanup, and rootfs injection for code execution.

Created build_cache_proxy.py with Redis backend, nginx caching layer, Docker volume storage, and tar.gz artifact compression. Features cache key generation from project files, 24h TTL, and build statistics endpoint.

Created cloud_runners.py with Modal.com and AWS Lambda integration. Features auto-platform selection, batch execution, GPU support detection, and unified API for serverless code execution with 5-10 minute timeouts.

Created screenshot_service.py with Selenium-based UI capture, multi-viewport support (desktop/tablet/mobile), batch processing, automatic container monitoring, and comparison image generation. Includes REST API for URL and container screenshot capture.

Created complete Kubernetes deployment manifests including namespace, deployments for all services (k0bra-app, sandbox-executor, build-cache-proxy, screenshot-service), Redis infrastructure, persistent storage, ingress with SSL, network policies, and automated deployment script. Features security constraints, resource limits, health checks, and horizontal scaling.

Created comprehensive telemetry_monitor.py with Prometheus metrics, real-time container monitoring, execution tracking, alert system, and resource usage analytics. Also created service_orchestrator.py to manage all services with health monitoring, auto-restart, and unified API. Updated requirements.txt with all new dependencies.
